DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate the effect of food on the relative bioavailability of a 50 mg BI 135585 XX tablet.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability and Pharmacokinetics of BI 135585 XX Administered as Tablet With and Without Food
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
